name: //ggondim repos
body:
### Welcome to GitHub Pages.
This automatic page generator is the easiest way to create beautiful pages for all of your projects. Author your page content here (using GitHub Flavored Markdown)[https://guides.github.com/features/mastering-markdown/], select a template crafted by a designer, and publish. After your page is generated, you can check out the new `gh-pages` branch locally. If you’re using GitHub Desktop, simply sync your repository and you’ll see the new branch.

### Architecture repos

#### taskrunrdg
[ggondim/taskrunrdg](https://github.com/ggondim/taskrunrdg)

A diagram convention to model task runner workflows. 

### JavaScript common repos

#### WebRepository
[ggondim/WebRepository](https://github.com/ggondim/WebRepository)

WebRepository is an engine for web storage using a provider abstraction, allowing you choose the best provider for your client, like IndexedDB, LocalStorage or SessionStorage.  

#### WebVersioner
[ggondim/WebVersioner](https://github.com/ggondim/WebVersioner)

A JavaScript component to create and manage object versions. 

#### WebReqr
[ggondim/WebReqr](https://github.com/ggondim/WebReqr)

WebReqr is an engine for web requests using a provider abstraction, allowing you choose the best provider for your client, like jQuery's $.http, Angular's $http and any third-party provider.

#### WebPoolr
[ggondim/WebPoolr](https://github.com/ggondim/WebPoolr)

WebPoolr is an engine for web scokets using a provider abstraction, that automatically determines the best provider [WebSockets or AJAX requests].

#### jsRFC 
[ggondim/jsRFC](https://github.com/ggondim/jsRFC)

jsRFC is a repository for IETF/RFC implementations using JavaScript. 

#### jsabel
[ggondim/jsabel](https://github.com/ggondim/jsabel)

jsabel is a framework to let users free of waiting HTTP requests, letting them to see changes immediately. 

### Angular.js repos

#### ngPermit
[ggondim/ngPermit](https://github.com/ggondim/ngPermit)

ngPermit is an Angular.js plugin compliant with OAuth flow and any custom authorization flow. 

### Other cool repos

#### MongoLabSDK
[ggondim/MongoLabSDK](https://github.com/ggondim/MongoLabSDK)

MongoLab SDK is a SDK library to use MongoLab REST API. 

#### ThePirateSharp
[ggondim/ThePirateSharp](https://github.com/ggondim/ThePirateSharp)

ThePirateSharp is a .NET API to make torrent searches in The Pirate Bay website.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
